website_summaries.verdict: Your skin will love this multi-purpose spray, both on top of and underneath makeup.
pros: Versatile spray works to minimize pores, hydrate skin, and set your makeup
Fine mist effectively coats the face, leaving it soft and refreshed
Has a strong but pleasant scent
Clears up dry patches quickly without making skin oily
cons: May cause breakouts on oily or sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Not the real product
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real Claudalie product. The bottle looks extremely similar, but compared side to side, the differences are: -text (on the back of the bottle), specifically it’s literally shinier -feel -functionality This product does nothing. You can spray your face with either water or this. The real product leaves your face tingling because it has ethanol and mint. Maybe you don’t want your pores to shrink as a result of [basically rubbing] alcohol. In that case, use this. If you want the effect and feel of the product you actually purchased, you’ll probably need to keep looking. and pay double the price for the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: SailTrueBlue

customer_reviews.title: Fun fact: It's actually cheaper to buy a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun fact: It's actually cheaper to buy a small bottle from Amazon than it is buying the fully bottle from Sephora! Although the difference is a couple of bucks so it is up to you. I personally love this Elixir and it makes me feel like I am consistently going to the spa, but in my room! This is a way better deal than actually going to the spa!
customer_reviews.author: Neda

customer_reviews.title: An EXTRA, not a necessity.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this Elixir after seeing it over and over on French Beauty must-buy lists. Even Liv Tyler had it in her medicine cabinet. While it's very refreshing as a midday spritz (or perhaps after a steamy shower to help close your pores), I didn't really find it amazing in any way. It smells essentially of peppermint. I didn't notice any extra hydration or smoothing. It's just a nice pick-me-up. Definitely an 'extra', not a skincare necessity (unless you just adore face mists, in which case I find Andalou Naturals Blossom + Leaf Toning Refresher to be a much better buy, and I get lots of compliments on its scent when used around others).
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I’ve learned to incorporate it into my daily skin and makeup routine. I also use it during the day or late afternoon as a light refresher. I don’t like that it has alcohol even though i haven’t noticed any drying effect. The smell is very herbal and “green”. The mister is very fine, which is awesome but the product often ends up on my clothes, which can be wasteful for the $50 full size. I will have to learn to spray it more economicaally. I still give it 5 stars though because of the overall quality of the product and how much I’ve enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered multiple times//then got bad product :(
customer_reviews.text: Update : I am still in LOVE with this product. I buy 2 at a time so I’m never without. My most recent purchase was a bad batch, both bottles. Smelled like skunk ! I may be better off buying from Sephora. I’ll try one more time here and give an update. Perhaps this seller had some old product this time. OMG !!!!!! I’m in love with this stuff. I keep one at the office as well for a mid day refresh. Use it am/ pm and midday. Can I buy in bulk please ?!? XOXOX !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: My very favorite face mist!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a face mist addict. This one is my very favorite. It has a nice, fresh, herbal smell. It doesn't feel heavy so you can put as little or as much as you want. It has a cooling, tingly effect that feels amazing. I keep the big bottle in my refrigerator in summer for extra cooling feel and the little one in my purse or bedside. I love love LOVE it!! The bottles are beautifully made. They never leak.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley von Eschenbach

customer_reviews.title: Ultra-fine mist
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product--it's great for setting makeup and it has a very light natural fragrance. The ultra-fine mist is unlike any other spray I've used from Ulta or Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product. I have really bad acne and combination skin. When I started using this in my facial routine, I noticed my complexion had gotten better. I got less acne and my face had gotten less oily.
customer_reviews.author: IzzytheWriter

customer_reviews.title: Skin saver product!
customer_reviews.text: Caudalie is always a good brand and offers good quality. At first I thought mist it was an stupid concept, but since I'm struggling with dry skin because of tretinoin lotion this mist is just life saver. I apply couple of times a day, before applying lotions and before make up and it makes all the difference. My face gets very hydrated and shinning (good type of shining). Only cons is the smell, it's a weird smell, but I can ignore this for some seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I expected more. This spray smells like nothing more than peppermint oil in a mist. As for moisturizing, I've given it a week and so far, I've not been impressed. It gives a kind of cool, refreshing feeling at first, but leaves a sort of film on my face that feels heavy once it dries. It does seem to give a slight brightness, but it is short-lived. I'll give it another week or so, but I'm honestly disappointed at this point.
customer_reviews.author: ccski721

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing non-greasy hydration
customer_reviews.text: I like the ultra fine mist that not only keeps my face hydrated but also keeps makeup looking fresh hours longer. My skin is oily so I use it after cleansing & before using sunscreen, then again after applying makeup. It works better than any other setting spray I have tried. It has a light, clean scent and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Villellaby

customer_reviews.title: Feels luxurious
customer_reviews.text: I always feel like I just came out of a spa when I use this product. My face feels tingly, cool and rejuvenated. I love the herbal smell of it which is not overpowering. When I travel I take it with me for that clean and fresh feeling. It revives me after a long flight.
customer_reviews.author: Vika

customer_reviews.title: Great MIST
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and my favorite part is that the it truly is a mist and that doesn't change even when it is almost finished! It's a great way to get ready in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Caudalie facial mist - review
customer_reviews.text: This mist refresherns your face with just a couple of sprays. It was a bit hard for me to get used to because I felt like I was spraying breath freshener on my face. It smells really minty and after awhile of using it I got used to the smell because the feeling felt really good after. It definitely feels refreshened after a couple of sprays. It worked really well on those summer days when you can't get anything to make you feel cooler.. you spray this on, and feel as if you just had washed your face with cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Anne

customer_reviews.title: Been buying this for years, so great!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this spray. No clue what’s it’s supposed to do but I add a spritz after makeup to create dewy look (negate a powdery finish). or if not wearing makeup I’ll spritz on for similar as well as a little brightening pop. The smell is divine.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This product is amaaaaazing! Keeps my skin moist, pores tight and has me stress free! This is a MAJOR part of my skincare routine, it makes it more of a spa experience. I wear this every single day, even to set my makeup!! Definitely a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Camia Doyle

customer_reviews.title: MY SKIN LOVES THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the travel version of this from Nordstrom and couldn't get enough! I put this one before bed (after cleansing), when I wake up (before moisturizing) and throughout the day on top of my makeup. The sent is definitely strong but it is one of the reasons I cannot stop spraying this! I will continue repurchasing this and recommending it to all my friends and family. Side note: the quick delivery was a HUGE plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not spraying this on my face!
customer_reviews.text: I received the facial mist yesterday and was very disappointed. Around the top of the liquid there was a ring of yellow. Which in my mind tells me the mist is old and has been sitting around for some time. I will not be putting this on my face but will instead toss it out. I want to thank Amazon Customer Service for taking care of this matter for me in such quick action. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, simple indulgence
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave me a bottle of this, and when it ran out, I had to get more. It arrived in great shape and super fast. And the one I ordered had a better sprayer than the one she got me! Super even spray, refreshing scent, and the right balance between light toner and light moisturizer. Perfect for mornings when you just want to get up and hit the ground running...or you slept late and have no choice!
customer_reviews.author: Christina M. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but Too Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this toner but it is too expensive. It smells wonderfully spicy and feels lovely in your skin though. Glass spray bottle is lovely and works very Well, spaying a delightful mist.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Adore Caulalie
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Used while on vacation and was so pleased I have ordered more. Refreshing pick-me-up, great under or over makeup, or just alone for something light but beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel product
customer_reviews.text: Will buy again. I love the scent and fresh feel of my skin after using it. Last month after a 12 hour flight I simply cleaned my face with a Cetaphil face wipe and then used this spray. I felt great and looked totally refreshed. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Kline

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fake or was stored improperly! The oils are brown and you can see by the separation! I’ve bought legit and fresh elixir from Caudalie before and it’s never done this! Look at the packaging... it too gives me reason this product is not real!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Dewy skin, smells
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it makes my skin feel! Dont ovwr do it, or your skin will get too dewy and then become oily as it mixes with your face oils. I dont mind the smell but my family hates it and doesnt like me spraying it near them.
customer_reviews.author: Quyn

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed with quality control.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle came with a bit of a yellow tint. Upon inspection, I realized it’s the inside of the bottle has a yellow discoloration to it. It’s only at the bottom. I’ve bought this spray many times before and this has never happened before.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works, just make sure new stock
customer_reviews.text: It helps to give moisture. Not sure this is an old stock...looks like getting bad so soon after only few months usage.
customer_reviews.author: Dewi Lubis

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome! I have bought several similar "mist" "hydrating" "spray ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I have bought several similar "mist" "hydrating" "spray any time" products and this is the only one that works at any time. It helps prep skin for moisturizer, smells AMAZING and does not mess up makeup if you use it throughout the day. I do go through it fairly quickly but it is still very much worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Clean smell and cool fresh mist
customer_reviews.text: So refreshing in the morning after washing my face! I use it also on a hot day to cool off. Even better, is If you keep in in the frig so it’s a cold mist. The smell is energizing on those days where you need a little push. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I use morning and night to spritz my face with a light moisture coating before I put on moisturizer and other facial products. It's also great on a hot day for a spritz just to perk you up. The smell makes me feel like I am at the spa.
customer_reviews.author: Kat A.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is refreshing and cooling on the face. It is such an awesome product. After using this with the serum, I almost instantly noticed pores smaller and skin feels tighter. Excellent and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Bottle for $18
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't read the fine print that this was a travel size. My bad. Way too expensive. It also has a strong scent which I don't care for on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Camcam

customer_reviews.title: Not the real product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the real stuff, this isn’t it. This bottle contains yellow liquid, the clear stuff is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: A French must
customer_reviews.text: Caudalie is incredibly refreshing and helps tone down your skin when irritated. It helps minimize your pores and with time improves your skin tone. Some people complain about the smell but I love it. It’s pure herbs with a little bit or myrrh.
customer_reviews.author: David Solano

customer_reviews.title: Product might be fake or watered down
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this twice on Amazon. The first time I loved it; I could feel it working and it smelled strong, but good. The second time I purchased it, it was like I just received a purse size bottle of water.
customer_reviews.author: daisy e.

customer_reviews.title: Cooling and Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product twice now. It won’t necessarily do anything to improve your skin, however it does feel very refreshing and cooling. I spray it on my face, neck and chest every night before bed, after cleansing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V.

customer_reviews.title: Love the way my skin feels.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product off and on for about 10 years. This last time I purchased it I couldn’t help but wonder why I ever stopped. I love the smell, the way it feels and how quickly it absorbs. It leaves my skin feeling fresh and glowing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I use it after applying makeup and to freshen makeup ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it after applying makeup and to freshen makeup later in the day. Kind of pricey though so not sure if I will order again as there are less expensive sprays that do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: jonijg

customer_reviews.title: I’m now a Caudalie convert
customer_reviews.text: First time user and will purchase large size next time. Does exactly what it says, brightens, tightens, refreshes. I’m a Caudalie convert!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible!
customer_reviews.text: This product smells horribly medicinal. The worst part is that they wouldn't return it because of shipping alcohol laws. Thankfully Amazon refunded me the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Pasquini

customer_reviews.title: This is fake, don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I normally order this from the Caudalie website, but I tried it here. It's not the same thing. It did not come in a Caudalie box, just a glass bottle with a rusty tube. Worse, when you spray it, it stung a little and smells like alcohol. The real product is amazing, so refreshing and smells lovely - this is not that.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: extremely drying
customer_reviews.text: extremely dries out your face. NOT ideal for dry skin. i DONT like the fragrance. too artificial. like hairspray for the face. good for setting makeup, but WILL NOT give you that dewy, glass skin appearance on face.
customer_reviews.author: sJC

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing must have daily skincare routine!
customer_reviews.text: My day is not complete without 5-6 spritzes of Caudalie's Beauty Elixir — heavenly scent, pore tightening, and helps set makeup. I just feel beautiful and complete with this product.
customer_reviews.author: eieio

customer_reviews.title: Warning. Large size seems to be fake or strange.
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars for the product. 1 Star for consistency. Ordered the small as a trial. Loved the refreshing feel and like to apply before putting on my vitamin oil or serum, helps for smooth application. Not I must have, but I enjoy it. However, the small and large size dome from different sellers, the large size is separate and smells different , makes me question if it’s real. I would NOT buy the large size on amazon again
customer_reviews.author: Amy J

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It sets my makeup in the morning, and it wakes up my face. On long days when I need more than a cup of coffee, this is my go-to. It's also fantastic for travel! It's cooling and brightening, and it smells divine...like fields of flowers in France!
customer_reviews.author: Sharilyn Twidwell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: While it was refreshing, I did not notice a single improvement to my skin. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic spray
customer_reviews.text: Love this spray. I have very sensitive skin and it did not irritate it at all. Nice glass bottle. Travel size too.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. !!!
customer_reviews.text: It is almost finished and I will buy it again, it has improved my face a lot. recommended 💯
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Peña

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, small, and meh smell
customer_reviews.text: Comparing this to the Kiehl's hydrating mist I used before, this one is 1) half the size, 2) same price, and 3) didn't smell amazing. Going back to Kiehl's.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Really nice mist
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mist. Great smell. No negatives. Would buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: glowing complexion
customer_reviews.text: I learned about this product when I noticed a friends glowing complexion. She told me what she used and I've been a convert ever since. If you like a dewy look, this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Voght

customer_reviews.title: Old product?
customer_reviews.text: There’s a weird yellow substance floating around in the bottle. Kind of afraid to use it! Will be returning. Product smells old.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica O.

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but it didnt do anything for my skin. Not a big fan of the smell. Also couldn't unscrew the cap to reuse the bottle, it had a really nice fine mist I'll say that. For a product this expensive would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey May

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like misting over my face after I've a applied my matte foundation for a more natural look. I sometimes use it on my bare face in the wintertime for extra moisture. Give it a shake beforehand and it's good to go. Fast shipping, didn't realize it was international. Would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: BKBeau

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to add as a third step to my daily skin routine which included a neutral cleanser and moisturizer. My skin felt smoother and it seemed to help clear up my acne. This bottle lasted me for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: brian perez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for your pores
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended for your pores!! It really works! 15 years of using this product I look 15 yrs younger than I am:)))) No kidding!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adele Marie Rose mazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down my favorite travel accessory. On any size trip, it fits in your bag or carry-on, and gives your skin a nice moisturizing boost in those dehydrating plane cabins. I really believe it wakes up a travel-weary face.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Caudalie for president!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I would bathe in it if I could! One spritz makes my skin feel so tight and refreshed.. Also it smells like an expensive spa. My ONLY qualm is that the bottom is so small! Caudalie needs to indulge us all and make a jumbo size beauty elixir for us junkies :)
customer_reviews.author: MaryD

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: The bottle leaked after just a few days. Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: They’re not kidding this really is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by pro MUA friends. Got some for Christmas and I’ve been spraying this on my face all day every day since I got it. Love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Just ok for me
customer_reviews.text: It's refreshing, but the smell is not pleasant in my opinion. I'll use this for now but when I run out I'll more than likely try something else
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think is the original one
customer_reviews.text: Guys I’m really use this product more than a year and i never got allergies but after use this I figure out this product it’s not the original one. I felling like the spray burn my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn Spray in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this stuff. Unicorn spray in a bottle. I use it after applying my makeup before my setting spray. Gives the make up look a nice polished finish! I swear by this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent facial mist
customer_reviews.text: I think this mist is ok. A blogger recommended it but I would prefer to spend a bit more on Queen of Hungary Mist - smells better and feels more hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Lakelily

customer_reviews.title: Despite the slightly strong scent, works well to refine ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite the slightly strong scent, works well to refine pores. Be careful not to get this product in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: MSB

customer_reviews.title: My favorite part of my morning routine.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this multiple times. If you love the feeling of tea tree oil you will love this spray. It’s super refreshing and I use it every day for years.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah Davis

customer_reviews.title: It’s in my “refresh” bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this great spray. It’s in my refresh bag where I keep lip balm, lavender oil and little things that make me feel great. I like to spray it in my hands... inhale and pat it on my face. It’s a lovely refreshing treat...
customer_reviews.author: Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, ingredients and works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite travel and gym bag accessories . The skin feels so vibrant after getting out of the shower and before moisturizer. Highly recommend! Its $12 in sephora so I usually just order it and save a trip
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this & feel the cooling when I spray it on my face! I have used it over makeup too. It's expensive, but it's a decent size bottle.
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this spray, it keeps my face so refreshed when I apply it and the scent is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it to tone before moisturizing and to mist during/after make up time.. It is refreshing, but I am not seeing any difference in my skin and I am not a super fan of the alcohol so I had to take one star off. I think I like the Super by Perricone better. The mist is very nice though..Just a little pricey for not seeing results.
customer_reviews.author: Joi

customer_reviews.title: The spray is refreshing. I use it especially in ...
customer_reviews.text: The spray is refreshing. I use it especially in the morning when I wake up or when I need to energize myself.
customer_reviews.author: TravelGirl

customer_reviews.title: The product is worth the price !!
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing, dries quickly , replenishes the skin,, scent is awesome❤️ Costly in price, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Picky

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money honey
customer_reviews.text: It smelled very herby and I’m not sure what the point of this is. I thought it was a waste of money. The Caudalie scrub on the other hand will be your skins bestie.
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: Perfect refresh for any occasion.
customer_reviews.text: I use Caudalie daily and love it! It's refreshing and my skin loves the moisturizer. I keep a small bottle in my bag, work space and car for a great pick-me-up when things get hectic. It's a perfect reset for back to back meetings. The light smell is crisp without being overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Maryvette

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing spray.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. Its been on my product rotation for years. I have normal skin type age 48. Great results.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Foster

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming smell
customer_reviews.text: May be “fragrance free” in that there is no added fragrance, but the smell is REALLY strong.
customer_reviews.author: Team Breakfast

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just love it! My skin changes every time I use it!
customer_reviews.author: juanita cubillos

customer_reviews.title: Best setting spray ever
customer_reviews.text: Always a fan of this amazing product highly suggest for dry skin and overall setting your makeup. The smell is amazing and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great toner with a little extra
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice toner/serum under moisturizer or by itself. It’s very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Refreshing/relaxing mid-day, especially if it's hot out.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Clayborn

customer_reviews.title: Bad scent
customer_reviews.text: I really do not like the scent. It smells like bug spray to me. Everything else about the product is fine, but the smell really ruins it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Essential For Every Make-Up Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down, one of my favorite products!! It is a must have for every make-up bag. If you wear any mineral or powder foundation, this stuff will help to set the make-up and give the (as I call it) pregnant glow without the pregnancy. It is especially awesome for hot weather because it has menthol in it, so it has a delightful cooling effect! It is a bit pricey, but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia Vita

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Truly changed my overall complexion. Pores look smaller, skin is so smooth, and looks refreshed! I use morning and night after cleansing face and before moisturizing. My skin is usually very oily, but this spray has helped tame the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Caudalie Beauty Elixir
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS PRODUCT! It leaves my skin feeling firm but not tight and I will definitely be buying more. Package came beautifully and safely wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Ct. Yankee

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels great
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this doesn't cause any harm to my skin, love the fresh smell.
customer_reviews.author: Shortie

customer_reviews.title: Nice face spray
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light, makes my face feel fresh and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin. Great for hot, dry summers.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Jimmerson

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I would like to purchase a full-sized bottle in the future
customer_reviews.author: AkoSiIam

customer_reviews.title: Came discolored and with clumps in it
customer_reviews.text: Came discolored and with clumps in it - don't buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kariera

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite beauty products
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite beauty products! Leaves my skin feeling fresh and I love the natural smell.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! My face is always getting blackheads and is greasy and generally feels awful. When I first used this spray, I got a wonderful, clean, tingly feeling that didn't fade away. It's quite an experience! I've gone through 3/4 of the small bottle in about 2 weeks because I'm addicted to the way it makes my skin feel. I had a facial about 2 weeks ago, before I started using this product and haven't seen a blackhead, yet. And the grease is gone! Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful lady

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING, feels very refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Smells AMAZING, feels very refreshing. Nice that it's available in 1oz so you can pack it in your carry on for flights. The mister sprays very finely, so it wont shmutz up your makeup.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie Brackett

customer_reviews.title: but smells and feels amazing, like I am a fancy lady
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's working yet, but smells and feels amazing, like I am a fancy lady. AND it comes it a really cute glass bottle. Love using it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: try it
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t expect it to be this good It makes my face a little itchy at the first because it’s the first time i use this and new for my face but after 2days using it, i can see the difference. I’ll probably order again.
customer_reviews.author: Orit touthang

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best makeup setting spray!! Smells great! Feels refreshing. I like to keep a small one in my purse, to use during the day or if my skin is feeling dry or I just need a refresh!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Endo

customer_reviews.title: EH, okay!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at the pepperminty tingle! But haven’t noticed much of a difference. I used it all but may not re-buy.
customer_reviews.author: ChanceDarcy

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it!
customer_reviews.text: I ❤️ It! It’s refreshing and it leaves my skin glowing!
customer_reviews.author: Javier C.

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing but too fragrant
customer_reviews.text: Very refreshing but SUPER fragrant. It's is a good spa like smell but once you use it, that's all you will smell for the rest of the day. It mixes with my perfume and I just don't like it...
customer_reviews.author: Karina K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My go to skin care most. It’s makes your skin have a radiant glow and moisturizes perfect for fall winter.
customer_reviews.author: sahirah abdur

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as a substitute for SK-II to try it out, but def not as good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a substitute for SK-II to try it out, but def not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Bina Maison

customer_reviews.title: Defective bottle design
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I heard great things about this product. Unfortunately, the spray top doesn't work on mine and there are no returns available. Looks like I'm out of luck and can't even get the elixir out of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.
